T02TD3662E:267a-1: a'arya m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02TD3662E:267a-3: 'phags ma 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD3662E:267a-4: 'phags ma 'od zer can nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3662E:267a-5: blo ldan sems dpa'i skyil krung gis //
T02TD3662E:267a-6: snying rje chen po rab dmigs la //
T02TD3662E:267a-7: snga bar snying gar zla ba la //
T02TD3662E:267a-8: aom yig dkar po bsgom par bya //
T02TD3662E:267a-9: rnam snang zhes pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD3662E:267a-10: ti yi 'od zer kun du dkar //
T02TD3662E:267a-11: ra ba zlum po mchod rten te /
T02TD3662E:267a-13: bsgrung ba'i don du mdun dang rgyab //
T02TD3662E:267a-14: g-yas dang g-yon dang gzhan yang steng //
T02TD3662E:267a-15: rim bzhin ma sogs bran la sogs //
T02TD3662E:267a-16: bu mo la sogs bum sogs dang //
T02TD3662E:267a-17: lugs ma thang sku bshes gnyen dang //
T02TD3662E:267a-18: po ti la gsos ji snyed pa'o //
T02TD3662E:267a-19: ti nas snying ga'i zla bar mam //
T02TD3662E:267a-20: mya ngan med kyi yal gar skyes //
T02TD3662E:267a-22: skud pa khab rnams bsams pa mo //
T02TD3662E:267a-23: ldang ba'i tshul gyis g-yas pa yi //
T02TD3662E:267a-24: sna bug nas byung bdun nyer gnas //
T02TD3662E:267a-25: gdug can kha dang mig drubs nas //
T02TD3662E:267a-26: ra ba'i phyi rol dag tu byas //
T02TD3662E:267a-27: gzhan yang rig sngags bzlas pa bya //
T02TD3662E:267a-28: sna bug g-yon 'ongs snying ga ru //
T02TD3662E:267a-29: bzhugs nas mya ngan med par 'gyur //
T02TD3662E:267a-30: mtshams bcing ba ni rab tu bya //
T02TD3662E:267a-31: 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
